channel.title: I feel noobish asking this! , can som1 teech me how to make commands
channel.description: hey if u could do this it would be great

item.title: I feel noobish asking this! , can som1 teech me how to make commands
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ BASIC COMMANDS @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

if (command.startsWith("3rdage")) { teleportToX = 2602; teleportToY = 4773; sendMessage("Welcome to 3rd age mini game, kill one of these to teleport on other wave"); }
^
Thats a tele commands (::3rdage) which teles you to 2602,4773 and says a messege ^

[code] if (command.startsWith(“blitz”) && playerRights == 3) {
addItem(555, 9999);
addItem(565, 9999);
addItem(560, 9999);

    }[/code]

This is a item command (::blitz) which only admins can do (playerRights == 3)
This gives you 3 items with a quantaty of 9999 the 555 565 560 are the item Ids

Read full topic
